Comments_List: I learned how to properly converse with someone else in their language and use context to get my thoughts across to another.

After completing my third semester of Indonesian at Yale I feel like I have a solid grasp on the language. I am very thankful to have the basic understanding of the Indonesian language, but even more so, I am so glad I took this class because I learned so much about Indonesia and Indonesian culture in a very unique way!
More advanced Indonesian vocabulary, grammar, and culture.
In this course there is a lot of interacting with your classmates and learning about Indonesian culture as well as the language.  A lot of very fun activities take place.

The course help to extensively improve my ability to speak the language more fluidly and efficiently. This can be attributed to the large amount of class time dedicated to improving speaking as well as vocabulary expansion.
Yes, it is a very fun and welcoming learning environment.
I would recommend this class to anyone wanting to begin learning a new language.
